glsa.title: BURP: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in BURP's Gentoo ebuild, the worst of which could lead to root privilege escalation.

background.p: A network backup and restore program.

description.p: It was discovered that Gentooâ€™s BURP ebuild does not properly set permissions or place the pid file in a safe directory.

impact.p: A local attacker could escalate privileges.

workaround.p: Users should ensure the proper permissions are set as discussed in the referenced bugs.
